official_title: To designate a portion of the Nantahala National Forest in Jackson County, North Carolina, in honor of James and Elspeth McClure Clarke.

summary.text: Designates the Panthertown Valley tract of the Nantahala National Forest in Jackson County, North Carolina, as the James and Elspeth McClure Clark Forest.

titles.title: To designate a portion of the Nantahala National Forest in Jackson County, North Carolina, in honor of James and Elspeth McClure Clarke.
